702590f-a.text:
2461-2479 East 17th street, east side, north of Ave. Y. The above number designates the Brighton Lumber and Trim Company, seen at the right. When East 17th Street is enlarged and paved the decrepit frame house will be totally demolished while the frame at the left and the brick to its right will be partially removed.

July 9, 1933.
P.L. Sperr.
